title: GB to TB Converter – Gigabytes to Terabytes (Decimal & Binary)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Key relationships Decimal: 1 TB = 1000 GB, 1 GB = 1000 MB. Binary: 1 TiB = 1024 GiB, 1 GiB = 1024 MiB. Mixed: 1 TB ≈ 0.9095 TiB and 1 TiB ≈ 1.0995 TB.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Decimal formulas TB = GB ÷ 1000 GB = TB × 1000 Example: 500 GB → 500 ÷ 1000 = 0.5 TB.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Binary formulas TiB = GiB ÷ 1024 GiB = TiB × 1024 Example: 1024 GiB → 1 TiB.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Through-bytes conversion Decimal: bytes = GB × 10⁹, bytes = TB × 10¹² Binary: GiB = bytes ÷ 2³⁰, TiB = bytes ÷ 2⁴⁰ The calculator performs these steps internally to show all four units consistently.
